title: A Synchronous Beginning to an Inquiry –  CS Lewis’ Miracles, the Holy Fire and the Dharmakaya Light
description:
3 things lined up today - I started listening to the dialogs in which JP Marceau talks about CS Lewis' Miracles with Paul Vander Klay, John Vervaeke and Jonathan Pageau, and I learn about the Holy Fire in the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem, and in ch. 1 of Lila, Phaedrus sees the halo emanating around and through Lila's face.

JP Marceau dialogs: https://youtu.be/sPLreFRV_Fs
https://youtu.be/Su_ggDVzKLw
Miracle of the Holy Fire: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIQWYUe_KDY
CS Lewis Miracles Essay: https://youtu.be/x06fnDnoC3U
